This place was recommended to me by a fellow Yelper and had a chance to check it out on my last day in Barcelona.  I'm so glad I did, as the food was fantastic!  They're conveniently located a few blocks from Barceloneta Beach and very close to the Barceloneta metro stop.Sit at the bar, stretching down the length of the place, and order yourself a cold beer.  I highly recommend the Filet with Foie Gras and the Roasted Peppers.  Everything was seasoned and cooked to perfection.  It was such a decadent and delicious meal!
